todos.content: Analyze current ShiftTimeNew.js component structure and identify refactoring opportunities
Extract custom hooks for state management (form handling, modal states, API calls)
Break down the large component into smaller sub-components (ShiftList, ShiftForm, ShiftActions, etc.)
Create utility functions for time calculations and data transformations
Optimize useState calls by grouping related state into objects
Extract constants and configuration to separate files
Implement proper error boundaries and loading states
Test the refactored components to ensure functionality remains intact
